labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to provide comprehensive Google Maps API functionality, enabling applications to access real-time geographic data, location-based services, and place details. The available tools focus on geographic information systems (GIS) operations such as geocoding, reverse geocoding, distance calculations, elevation data, and directions. This server enhances applications with location awareness, making it particularly useful for navigation, logistics, and location-based services.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Travel & Maps" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around location services, maps, and geographic data. "API Integration" is added as a secondary label since the server provides a facade for interacting with the Google Maps API. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Google Maps API Server
server_info_crawled.author: @lowkeyrd/google-map-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Leverage the power of Google Maps to enhance your applications with location services, directions, and place details. Integrate seamlessly with your LLMs to provide real-time geographic data and insights. Start building location-aware applications effortlessly with this MCP server.

tools.name: maps_geocode
tools.description: Deploy Server Google Maps API Server @lowkeyrd/google-map-mcp-server Try in Playground maps_geocode

tools.name: maps_search_places
tools.description: Search for places using Google Places API

tools.name: maps_place_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific place

tools.name: maps_distance_matrix
tools.description: Calculate travel distance and time for multiple origins and destinations

tools.name: maps_elevation
tools.description: Get elevation data for locations on the earth

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@lowkeyrd/google-map-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: googleMapsApiKeyHack
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Google Maps API key for authentication
